select chart_no , dept_name as "last_dep" , patient_name , trunc((to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'))-to_number(to_char(decode(substr(id_no, 8, 1), '1', '19', '2', '19', '20')||substr(id_no, 1, 6))))/10000) as "age" , "id_no" , memo , first_visit , last_visit , "new" , "gender" , phone , protector , address from ( select chart_no , dept_name , patient_name , id_no , rpad(substr(id_no,1,8),14,'*')as "id_no" , address , memo , first_visit , last_visit , phone , protector , decode(new, 'Y', '초진', 'N', '재진') as "new" , case when substr(id_no, 8, 1) in ('1', '3') then '남' when substr(id_no, 8, 1) in ('2', '4') then '여' end "gender" from patient left join department on(last_dep = dept_no) ) order by last_visit desc

select chart_no , dept_name as "last_dep" , patient_name , trunc((to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'))-to_number(to_char(decode(substr(id_no, 8, 1), '1', '19', '2', '19', '20')||substr(id_no, 1, 6))))/10000) as "age" , "id_no" , phone , protector , address , memo , first_visit , last_visit , "new" , "gender" from ( select chart_no , dept_name , patient_name , id_no , rpad(substr(id_no,1,8),14,'*')as "id_no" , address , memo , first_visit , last_visit , phone , protector , decode(new, 'Y', '초진', 'N', '재진') as "new" , case when substr(id_no, 8, 1) in ('1', '3') then '남' when substr(id_no, 8, 1) in ('2', '4') then '여' end "gender" from patient left join department on(last_dep = dept_no) ) where chart_no = #{chartNo}

mapper.select: select chart_no , patient_name , "gender" , trunc((to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'))-to_number(to_char(decode(substr(id_no, 8, 1), '1', '19', '2', '19', '20')||substr(id_no, 1, 6))))/10000) as "age" , dept_name from ( select chart_no , patient_name , id_no , case when substr(id_no, 8, 1) in ('1', '3') then '남' when substr(id_no, 8, 1) in ('2', '4') then '여' end "gender" , dept_name , enroll_date||' '||enroll_time as "enroll" from clinic c join patient using(chart_no) join department using(dept_no) where status = 'W' order by "enroll" asc )

select chart_no , patient_name , "gender" , trunc((to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD'))-to_number(to_char(decode(substr(id_no, 8, 1), '1', '19', '2', '19', '20')||substr(id_no, 1, 6))))/10000) as "age" , dept_name from ( select chart_no , patient_name , id_no , case when substr(id_no, 8, 1) in ('1', '3') then '남' when substr(id_no, 8, 1) in ('2', '4') then '여' end "gender" , dept_name , enroll_date||' '||enroll_time as "enroll" from clinic c join patient using(chart_no) join department using(dept_no) where status = 'P' order by "enroll" asc )

select pre_no , clinic_no , inject_day , decode(usage, '1', '식전', '2', '식후')||' 30분' as "usage" , TO_CHAR(to_date(enroll_date), 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"' ) pre_date , patient_name , id_no , emp_no , emp_name , diseases_code , disease from clinic join prescription using(clinic_no) join patient using(chart_no) join member using(emp_no) join disease using(diseases_code) where clinic_no = #{clinicNo}
select med_no , med_name , dosetime from pre_med join medicine using(med_no) where pre_no = ( select pre_no from clinic join prescription using(clinic_no) where clinic_no = #{clinicNo} )

select pay_no , clinic_no , patient_name , enroll_date , enter_date , leave_date , fee , nvl(enter_fee,'0') "enter_fee" , nvl(s.S_PAYMENT,'0') "s_payment" , chart_no , nvl(meals,'0') "meals" , disease , s.surgery_name , fee + nvl(enter_fee,0) + nvl(s.S_PAYMENT,0) + nvl(meals,0) "total" from pay p left join clinic using(clinic_no) left join patient using(chart_no) left join surgery using(surgery_no) left join proom_booking using(clinic_no) left join disease using(DISEASES_CODE) left join surgery s using(SURGERY_NO) where clinic_no = #{clinicNo}
SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(to_date(#{nowDate}), 'MM') + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WORKING_DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(to_date(#{nowDate})), 'DD')
select proom_no , room_name , capacity , price from patientroom order by proom_no asc

SELECT M.WORKING_DAY, PB.PROOM_NO, PB.ROOM_NAME, LISTAGG(p.patient_name, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY p.patient_name) as "namelist", count(*) as "count" FROM PROOM_BOOKING PB JOIN ( SELECT WORKING_DAY, PROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME FROM ( SELECT to_char(TRUNC(to_date(#{nowDate}), 'MM') + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WORKING_DAY FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(to_date(#{nowDate})), 'DD') ), ( SELECT PROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME FROM PATIENTROOM ) ) M ON ( (M.WORKING_DAY BETWEEN PB.ENTER_DATE AND PB.LEAVE_DATE) AND M.PROOM_NO = PB.PROOM_NO AND M.ROOM_NAME = PB.ROOM_NAME) LEFT JOIN CLINIC C ON(PB.CLINIC_NO = C.CLINIC_NO) LEFT JOIN PATIENT P ON(C.CHART_NO = P.CHART_NO) GROUP BY M.WORKING_DAY, PB.PROOM_NO, PB.ROOM_NAME ORDER BY M.WORKING_DAY, PROOM_NO
